CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 28, 1950, pg. 23, reads: "Honored at Loendi - Frankie Laine, the singing sensation, and the great dancing Step Brothers, who appeared at a downtown theatre, were feted at the Loendi Club Wednesday night. Both Laine and the Step Brothers were impressed by the hospitality of the club.  Needless to say, they had a swell time. - Allen Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of five men, including man wearing scarf and overcoat in center surrounded by the Step Brothers, posed in front of dark curtain
